subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer raced into the third round of the Paris Masters with an exhilarating display of attacking tennis on Wednesday, thrashing Andreas Seppi, 6-1, 6-1, in 47 minutes.
snippet: Roger Federer raced into the third round of the Paris Masters with an exhilarating display of attacking tennis on Wednesday, thrashing Andreas Seppi, 6-1, 6-1, in 47 minutes.
